research_interests:
Dr. Pessoa research interest includes the genetic and epigenetic characterization of prostate cancer and is geared towards identifying factors contributing to aggressive disease, describing the mechanisms of resistance to combination therapies, and developing urine and blood-based biomarkers for disease risk stratification. He has authored numerous peer reviewed manuscripts and book chapters in urologic oncology, is an active lecturer, and serves as a reviewer for several urologic oncology scientific journals.
